column1: #Text=A shop where hairdressers and beauticians work !
#Text=While your hairdresser cuts and styles your hair , a beautician , does your nails and other cosmetic treatments .
#Text=Salon 's can either range up to being posh and fancy or run down and old .
#Text=Stuck on idea 's on how to decorate your beauty salon ?
#Text=There 's no point going to Ikea with a rough idea and getting everything that looks good .
#Text=Do you have enough money to run the place ?
#Text=Do you already have the place where the salon would be ?
#Text=Do you know anyone who is qualified ?
#Text=Once you start to employ other colleagues , you 're going to need to start paying them .
#Text=Make sure you have enough money for everyone else as well .
#Text=Is you salon going to be red ? White ? Blue ?
#Text=What parts of your salon are going to be different colours ?
#Text=Are you going to go for a posh look for your salon , or maybe diamonds and pink ?
#Text=Make sure you write this all down .
#Text=Once you have the budget and colour scheme , proceed to step 3 .
#Text=Know what needs to go in your salon .
#Text=Look at the ' Things You Will Need ' section below , do n't figure out where your furniture is going to go yet , just figure out what you need and make sure everything will fit in your salon .
#Text=Everything we have included is a definite must , so make sure to include it in your salon .
#Text=Once you 've written down what you need , go to a store like Ikea and see if you can buy your furniture there .
#Text=If you ca n't , keep looking but if you can , take pictures and notes of every item you need .
#Text=Make a plan for where your furniture will go .
#Text=If it looks too cramped , you 're going to need to make the salon bigger .
#Text=If it looks too spaced out , add more furniture .
#Text=When you 've made your plan , make sure you 're happy .
#Text=If you 're working with other people and do n't like their idea 's , speak up .
#Text=Come up with a name for your salon , make posters and business cards and hand them out to everyone you know .
#Text=Make a website , if you know how to and make sure it looks professional and neat .
#Text=Make sure your name is n't tacky , does n't offend someone and make sure that it is n't taken already !
#Text=Place all your furniture into your salon .
#Text=Make sure you 've installed sinks , shelves for your shampoo and conditioner , bottles of hairspray , nail polish and nail products .
#Text=Take a picture of your new salon !
#Text=Enjoy it , spend time there , employ the right people , hold meetings , hold interviews .
